name: Fusion Kid
description:
Fusion Kid is a card crafting battler game created for the Metafab On-chain Jam by Chris Day, Socrates Sotos, Ben Palevsky and Neil Sarkar.

The core gameplay involves crafting cards in combat from the four timeless elements Fire, Water, Umami, and ~Jazz~

This game was made in a week and integrates with Metafab to enable minting of cards on Polygon.

The game is fully playable as a vertical slice of combat and deck management.

Our backend sometimes times out when making blockchain requests, but minting card does happen successfully.

Roadmap:

* permanent crafting during deckbuilding

* pvp combat

* player marketplaces to trade cards
